column4: hi peeps.. question... there is some remnant of a window that won't go away on my screen.. i tried xrefresh with no luck.. how do I get it to go away? everything else works fine
did you try changing wallpaper (and back)?

yes it just stays there. i'm thinking it's one of the defunt processes running inside google chrome, actually, because it was a right click on a link that put the window there (it was the grey background for right click selections on a page), then the writing and everything else disapperaed when i clicked away, but the background grey box remained....
so I wonder if there's a way besides just restarting chrome..
